original_text: The other tribes will each have a part of the land that is south of this special part. The land for each of these tribes will go all the way from Israel's border in the east to the Mediterranean Sea in the west.
korean_text: 그 나머지 모든 지파는 동쪽에서 서쪽까지는 베냐민의 몫이요

sentences.original_text: The other tribes will each have a part of the land
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 지파들은 각각 땅의 일부를 가질 것입니다

sentences.original_text: that is south of this special part
The land for each of these tribes will go all the way
sentences.korean_translation: 이들 각 지파를 위한 땅은 끝까지 뻗어 갈 것입니다

sentences.original_text: from Israel's border in the east
to the Mediterranean Sea in the west
